ai-tha-ap106:1.1_0: “There is no need for the Fortunate One,
ai-tha-ap106:2.1_0: Through that deed and through its result—
ai-tha-ap106:2.4_0: in the teaching of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap106:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap106:3.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap106:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap106:3.4_0: this carpet is full of fruit.
ai-tha-ap106:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pūraṇa Kassapa.
ai-tha-ap106:7.1_0: Persistence off the fourth Elder Nuns,
